WorkItem.ClosedComment:
I'm not seeing this in Visual Studio 2012 with TS 0.8.2 do you have any extensions installed?

Can you give more details about where you see this?
WorkItem.Description:
Interesting issue moving from version 0.8.0. 
When I install 0.8.1 or 0.8.2 I get the error cannot read from file lib.d.ts: File not found. 
So I turned on debugging and it is looking in the right directory and everything, it just acts like it is not there. Is there anything that I should check? 
When I re-install 0.8.0 everything works again.

Interesting how it says that it can't find any files at all.
